sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts AT4/M320 range, practice qualification and qualification at RG 203 and 203A on 19OCT23 IOT maintain a high level of readiness with individual weapons proficiency
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: Ensure Bull Troop SMs are fundamentally sound on all levels on marksmanship with the AT4 and M320 IOT prepare for upcoming training events and maintain lethality within Bull Troop.
sections.EXECUTION:
}:
Conduct PMI
Rehearse proper loading, firing, unloading, misfire procedures, and dry fire with AT4 and M320
Conduct written test
Conduct proper loading, firing, unloading, and misfire procedures
sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
16 Bull Troop soldiers are safely qualified AT4 . and 12 M320
Concept of the Operation: All will draw their respective weapons systems at Troop.
SMs will link-up at the Troop AO for transportation to Range 105.
SMs will SP to Range 105.
Range set- up tutorial, OIC & RSO brief
SMs will conduct PMI
SMs will conduct a written test on the M3
SMs will begin training once range is wet and ammo has been dropped off.
SMs will conduct M3and M320 qualification at Range 105 IAW TC 3-22.84.
Safety: 1x lane safety will be present for each 1x Soldiers on the range
